name: Mahjong Travel
description:
Journey into the world of mahjong! Colorful locations, pleasant music and interesting levels will meet you on your way!

There are more than 100 mahjong layouts in the game! Everything you love about the genre, from simple and classic to sophisticated themed ones. Spend your free time traveling through 6 locations. Multi-layered levels and huge 200 chip layouts! Everything you need for a great night out!

- collect gold chips to pass the levels and unlock the next location
- collect bonus chips and get extra coins and bonuses
- combo multiplier to boost your coins
- 6 locations
- 120 levels
- 2 game modes of difficulty
